title: Emily Ratajkowski is all in for an even tan as she strips off on Miami beach
text:
Emily looked stunning in a black swimsuit (Pictures: MEGA)

Emily Ratajkowski has proven she’s all in for an even tan as she stripped off on the beach while enjoying a chilled day in Miami.

We’re getting major holiday envy right now.

The model, who previously opened up alongside Kourtney Kardashian about her secrets to being confident, looked mega chilled as she enjoyed a day on the beach.

Emily, 28, looked stunning in a black swimsuit (from her own brand of course) as she rocked a leopard print hat and enjoyed a beer. Why not?

The star enjoyed a relaxing beach day (Picture: MEGA)

Pulling her swimsuit down, she went topless at points to avoid an uneven tan – although she appeared to suffer a spot of sunburn on her thigh.

Don’t shun the factor 50, girl. It works wonders.

The star could also be seen diving into a Ariel Levy’s memoir The Rules Do Not Apply as she enjoyed her relaxing day.

The Gone Girl actress previously opened up about being a body positivity activist, admitting she grew up ‘ashamed’ of her body.

She’s avoiding an uneven tan at all costs (Picture: MEGA)

‘I’m really about body positivity, for me I grew up and I developed super young. I was criticised at 13,’ she explained to People.

‘I felt really ashamed of my body but I’ve come full circle, and now I’m like, “Do your thing!” I really want young girls to see that and feel that way about themselves.’

Meanwhile, she previously shared her thoughts on having inner confidence alongside Kourtney, explaining: ‘[When I post nude pictures on Instagram] the initial reaction is, “Oh my god, naked again” or “She’s so stupid” and “Do you have nothing else to offer?”

‘But actually, I’m running a business out of this. It’s about personal branding.’

She added on Poosh.com: ‘I love the idea of white, older men in suits saying they don’t take me seriously [in business] while I make more money than them.’

Preach, girl.
